column5: WELL WITH THE STORM STARTIN NOW I WAS SURE GLAD MY WIFE PUSHED ME OUT THE DOOR TO GO FISHIN THIS MORN!!! GRABBED MY BRAND NEW CUSTOM MADE ROD AND OFF I WENT AT 5AM. WATERS WERE PRIME!!! GREAT DAY TO BREAK THE NEW ROD IN!!! AND BOY DID I BREAK IT IN!!! FIRST 6 DRIFT = 6 FISH THE MORN WAS UNREAL!!!! IN THE TOP 3 DAYS OF MOST FISH I HAVE EVER  CAUGHT IN A DAY!!! SAW 4 GUYS ALL DAY ON 2 CREEKS!!! HERES JUST A 1/4 OF THE FISH I CAUGHT TODAY  PRAISE BE THE WIFEY FOR KICKIN ME OUT  LOL  NEW CUSTOM ROD WITH LIMITED EDITION RIVERRUN REEL                         SOME SCARED CHROME
wow I know winter is almost over CC is posating chrome , Beauty fish and great report
Nice catch! Good looking reel and rod, and beautiful chroms. What you do with your old float fishing setup? Did you sell them, or use as back up?
The fish are ok, but man is that river runs reel ever tacky looking
Oh sure...you go out and catch more fish today than I have ever caught TOTAL....LOL.  Great job Scott!  We'll have to get out soon!!!
wow.. some amazing action before the storm.. great stuff..  kevin
Great Scott!!!!!    What beauty fish.  Very nice day out there for you.  I'm impressed.  Joey
great looking fish!
Beauties.  And the fish are nice too
I've heard Scott called a lot of things...but beautiful isn't one of them...LOL.
didn't see anything consistant in your presentation . you worked for those beauty bows . hats off , well done .
Now, those are some nice fish! WTG!
WTG CC!   few more trips for whities and lakers and i put away the ice rods, and break out the pin aswell.  Should be a good spring, with lots of water!
Hehe I was talking about the rod and reel thank you very much.    Not that there's anything wrong with that.....
congrats on a good day and on the fish
That's a soils day's fishing nice job.  -R-
Respect
THANKS ALL!!! WAS A TREAT TODAY INDEED!!! YOUNG ONE YA ALWAYS NEED A BACK UP BRO  LOL
Great day! Notice the fish were on a selction of different offerings aswell!
Nice to see you get out there Scott nice colours on the rainbows.
Some beauty fish man. Gotta love this time of the year eh!
You make it look easy.  Congrats on such a great day.
